aboutMe.description1: Greetings üôãüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è! My name is Oyintanda Zongwana, an aspiring full-stack developer with a penchant for simplicity and a knack for making friends faster than you can say 'Hello, World!' console.log('Not always') When I'm not deep in code, you might find me working out, learning something new, or skating‚Äîyes, I did just sneak that in there.
aboutMe.description2: I speak several languages, including Zulu, which I picked up while living in KZN from the tender age of 4 to 9. I also speak English, Afrikaans, and my home language, Xhosa. My love affair with coding began in Grade 9 when I first discovered what coding was and its myriad functions. Fueled by an insatiable curiosity, I dove headfirst into the world of programming, and now, here I am, ready to turn lines of code into digital masterpieces.

projects.name: Memory Game
projects.description: I used python and flusk for the front-end. You choose between two games to play either levels or a picture game.

projects.name: First E-com Project
projects.description: I used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript. This is a ecommerce website. It has some basic CRUD functions and it uses local storage.

projects.name: Second E-com Project
projects.description: I used Node.js, MySQL and Vue.js. This is a ecommerce website. It has CRUD functionality and it uses cookies and tokens.

projects.name: calculator
projects.description: I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript. This calculator has all the basic functions of a normal calculator.

projects.name: BMI calculator
projects.description: I used HTML,CSS,JavaScript. This is a basic BMI calculator.

projects.name: Temp-Convertor
projects.description: I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript. This is a temperature convertor, it converts ¬∞C to ¬∞F.

projects.name: TO-DO-LIST
projects.description: I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript. This is a to do list, to help you with your daily life and keep track of your day/plans.

education.description: I joined here in April and have been studying coding, taking a step closer to my goals. I have learnt Bootstrap, CSS, Vue.Js, HTML, Javascript, Node.js, Git, MySQL.
I spent  my highschool years in this school. I matriculated here in 2023.

testimonials.name: Marcus Adonis
testimonials.message: Works well with a group and brings good qualities to the table. Does his best to solve problems the most efficient way possible. Very wise this one

testimonials.name: Gwiba Mabandla
testimonials.message: O.T is calm and gets straight to point, he is always eager to know what makes things tick and will do anything to find that answer. He is confident and you can see it through his work and personality. We need more people like him.

testimonials.name: Keegan Niekerk
testimonials.message: Very charismatic and always willing to work his hardest , he is someone who is very easy to work with and always able to bring light to any room. He's a very dedicated young man who works hard to achieve his goals.

testimonials.name: Chandre Leigh Davids
testimonials.message: Oyintanda is a very intelligent individual. He truly is one of the best people to talk to if you'd like but do not allow his calmness to fool you, he is very dedicated in terms of the projects he is required to do. He truly is a person of interest in terms of people who never say no to a challenge.

testimonials.name: Chloe Almazien
testimonials.message: Oyintanda or OT as i know him is a fascinating young man who has his own ideals and views on the world, he is alive with expression and enthusiasm. I would say that he is bold and fear ,always determined to reach heights that he has set for himself, but never forgets to look to the next person be it to ask for help or  to help them . OT is an visionary.

testimonials.name: Matthew Dean Brown
testimonials.message: As OT's lecturer, I have had the distinct opportunity to observe his remarkable growth and dedication to the field of full-stack development.OT has consistently demonstrated a keen understanding of both the theoretical and practical aspects of programming. Beyond technical skills, OT brings a unique blend of creativity, diligence, and collaboration to every task.
